title: NPR Interviews President Barack Obama
description: Morning Edition host Steve Inskeep and NPR Visuals editor Kainaz Amaria join political editor Domenico Montanaro and Politics Podcast host Sam Sanders to talk about what it's like to interview a sitting President at the White House, as Steve did this week for NPR's Morning Edition. His interview with President Obama will be released Monday, December 21 here on the podcast, online at npr.org, and on your local public radio station. Find the team on Twitter @NPRinskeep, @kainazamaria, @samsanders, and @DomenicoNPR, and at npr.org/politics.
